title: Customer Plan Change Request - Upgrade
description: A customer frequently exceeds their data limit and wants to upgrade to a plan with more data.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and review their recent data usage, confirming overages.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer has had data overage charges for the last 3 months.

tasks.description: Recommend a specific higher-tier plan that would be more cost-effective than paying overage fees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends the 'Unlimited Plus' plan, showing it would have saved the customer money.

tasks.description: Process the plan upgrade and confirm the new monthly cost and features.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully upgrades the plan and clearly communicates the new terms.
